get.summary: Returns a paginated list of conversations.

post.summary: Creates a new conversation with the given settings.

delete.summary: Deletes a conversation by its ID.

get.summary: Gets the message history for a specific conversation.
Gets the settings for a specific conversation.

put.summary: Updates the settings for a specific conversation.

post.summary: Sends a message to a conversation and returns an SSE stream.

get.summary: Returns a list of all knowledge bases.
Returns a list of files in a knowledge base.

post.summary: Uploads a file to a knowledge base.

delete.summary: Deletes a file from a knowledge base.

put.summary: Toggles the enabled state of a file.

get.summary: Returns a list of all available models.
Returns a list of available chat models.
Returns a list of available vector models.
Returns a list of supported chat models.
Returns a list of supported vector models.

put.summary: Sets the status of a model.

get.summary: Returns the version information of the application.

ChatMessageRequest.description: ChatMessageRequest 聊天消息请求（用于Swagger文档）

ChatRequest.description: ChatRequest 聊天请求 - 直接使用 SDK 的 AsyncChatRequest

ConversationSettings.description:
ConversationSettings 对话设置
@Description 对话设置信息

DefaultKnowledgeBaseSettings.description: DefaultKnowledgeBaseSettings 默认知识库设置（用于持久化）

DefaultSettings.description: DefaultSettings 统一的默认设置（用于持久化）

FileToggleEnableRequest.description: FileToggleEnableRequest 文件启用/禁用请求

KnowledgeBaseConfig.description: KnowledgeBaseConfig 知识库配置（公用字段）

ModelStatusEnableRequest.description: ModelStatusEnableRequest 模型状态启用/禁用请求

SSEChatEvent.description: SSEChatEvent SSE聊天事件 - 直接使用 SDK 的 StreamEvent

VersionInfo.description: VersionInfo 版本信息响应结构

AvailableModelListResponse.description: AvailableModelListResponse represents an available model list response.

ConversationHistoryResponse.description: conversationHistoryResponseWrapper represents a conversation history response.

ConversationListResponse.description: conversationListResponseWrapper represents a conversation list response.

ConversationSettingsResponse.description: conversationSettingsResponseWrapper represents a conversation settings response.

DefaultSettingsResponse.description: defaultSettingsResponseWrapper represents a default settings response.

KnowledgeBaseListResponse.description: knowledgeBaseListResponseWrapper represents a knowledge base list response.

KnowledgeBaseResponse.description: knowledgeBaseResponseWrapper represents a knowledge base response.

KnowledgeFileListResponse.description: knowledgeFileListResponseWrapper represents a knowledge file list response.

KnowledgeFileResponse.description: knowledgeFileResponseWrapper represents a knowledge file response.

ModelSaveResponse.description: modelSaveResponseWrapper represents a model save response.

SupportedModelListResponse.description: SupportedModelListResponse represents a model list response.

SupportedVectorModelListResponse.description: SupportedVectorModelListResponse represents a vector model list response.

VersionInfoResponse.description: versionInfoResponseWrapper represents a version info response.
